DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate putative peripheral effect ghrelin glucose lipid metabolism healthy men . Eight subject enrol . The hypothesis ghrelin infusion cause insulin resistance lipolysis .
DOC.criteria: 1 . BMI < 27 kg/m2 2 . Written inform consent 3 . Nonsmoker 1 . Any disease include epilepsy 2 . Any use medication ( excl . paracetamol ) 3 . Present previous malignancy 4 . Alcohol dependency 5 . Allergy trial medication
